title: A1534 emc 2746
message:
History on this, 

It came to me in April this year for a new battery, Got a call from them yesterday saying the battery had failed and the keyboard wasn't working due to the battery swelling,

I get the Air today and open it up the battery looks perfect no swelling at all, but not seen in OS and wont run off batt, I then notice that the keyboard works fine on the login screen but as soon as OS boots keyboard does not  work ( Trackpad does! ) (( Also noticed there is no keyboard back light and pushing the keyboard brightness buttons on keyboard causes the mac to hang! ))

I then notice that the charger that was in the bag with this air was very badly frayed with bare wires exposed, 

I've installed a new battery and now it charges and runs off new battery but still no Keyboard or backlight , Keyboard works fine in login screen and in internet recovery setup it just stops as soon as OS loads, 

I'm thinking something has caused the keyboard backlight to blow and as soon as the OS is telling the machine to turn on the keyboard backlight its killing the keyboard?

Is this possible? have you experienced this issue before? what should I do from here?>

Thanks in advance

title: A1534 emc 2746
message:
Once macOS loaded, KB/TP run in SPI mode.
Seems that KB only works in USB mode, before loading macOS; strange that TP still works then.

For no KB backlight issue, be sure first the ALS works properly.
Use flashlight directed to webcam and check the screen backlight reaction.
KB backlight keys are disabled?

What is the 820-xxxxx code of your board; always must to post in title.

title: A1534 emc 2746
message:
Tested again both with internal hdd and my USB bootabel os, same deal keyboard works in login screen not at all when os loads, 

ALS seems fine, screen dims and brightens when moving a flashlight into webcam, 

Keyboards lights are enabled and turned up max, no kb back light working at all. 

I've tried my best to see where the kb backlight connects to unplug it but can't figure it out. 

As for the 820 x'x code this logic board is fkin small! I can't see it anywhere, where on earth is it on these tiny ass boards?

title: A1534 emc 2746
message:
Near the battery connector?
Maybe under some plastic foil...

820-00045 (2015), 00244 (2016), 00687 (2017).

title: A1534 emc 2746
message:
found it, Under a sticker!

[ATTACH type="full"]60874[/ATTACH]

title: A1534 emc 2746
message:
Just spotted someone selling a bottom case with track pad and keyboard quite cheap on ebay for this mac, £20 -

Its listed as fully working but it has the space bar missing, I messaged the guy and he said he's an experienced IT guy and these space bars are impossible to change, I find this hard to believe? 

Worth taking a punt on getting this and trying it then swapping the space bar over if it works?

title: A1534 emc 2746
message:
For 20 pounds, is a good way to discard KB/TP issue.
Only trackpad flex is more expensive on Aliexpress.

title: A1534 emc 2746
message:
Keyboard arrived and this fixed this problem, Works perfectly and with backlight,

But spacebar is missing, I did try to swap over the one from the original keyboard but it just keeps dropping off, This seems impossible! Have you any tips on swapping a spacebar on one of these butterfly keyboards?

title: A1534 emc 2746
message:
No idea really.
I don't have such model here for test.
Try searching on Internet, maybe someone uploaded videos.
